paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Three TTR variants were extracted with detailed penetrance data and individual case information.

patients.phenotype: sensory dysfunction, spinal stenosis, heart disease, history of Achilles tendon rupture

individual_records.phenotype_details: sensory dysfunction, spinal stenosis, heart disease, history of Achilles tendon rupture
individual_records.evidence_sentence: The patient in whom this alteration was detected was 67 years of age at diagnosis.

functional_data.summary: The variant results in significant decrease in the structural stability of TTR.

variants.segregation_data: The patient's brother exhibited similar manifestations at presentation.
variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on structural analysis and clinical presentation.
variants.additional_notes: The patient's maternal first cousin has been diagnosed with ATTR-CM with the confirmed mutation of p.D58H.
key_quotes: Based on the weight of available evidence to date, the p.D58H variant is likely to be pathogenic.

patients.demographics: Seventh decade of life, sex not specified
patients.phenotype: history of autonomic dysfunction, motor, and sensory dysfunction

individual_records.phenotype_details: history of autonomic dysfunction, motor, and sensory dysfunction
individual_records.evidence_sentence: The p.A65V variant was detected in a patient in the seventh decade of life who presented with a history of autonomic (gastrointestinal symptoms and unintentional weight loss), motor, and sensory dysfunction.

functional_data.summary: The variant results in significant decrease in the structural stability of TTR.

variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on structural analysis and clinical presentation.
variants.additional_notes: No cascade testing for this family was performed to date.
key_quotes: Based on the available evidence to date, this variant is likely to be pathogenic.

patients.phenotype: congestive heart failure, dilated cardiomyopathy, heart disease, chronic kidney disease, sensory dysfunction, gastrointestinal symptoms

individual_records.phenotype_details: congestive heart failure and dilated cardiomyopathy
individual_records.evidence_sentence: A patient in the fourth decade of life presented with congestive heart failure and dilated cardiomyopathy.

individual_records.phenotype_details: heart disease and chronic kidney disease
individual_records.evidence_sentence: A patient in the sixth decade of life presented with heart disease and chronic kidney disease.

individual_records.phenotype_details: sensory dysfunction, gastrointestinal symptoms, heart disease, bilateral carpal tunnel syndrome
individual_records.evidence_sentence: A patient in the eighth decade of life presented with sensory dysfunction, gastrointestinal symptoms, heart disease, and bilateral carpal tunnel syndrome.

individual_records.phenotype_details: restrictive cardiomyopathy, heart disease, renal issues, positive PYP scan
individual_records.evidence_sentence: A patient in the fifth decade of life with restrictive cardiomyopathy, heart disease, renal issues, and positive PYP scan.

functional_data.summary: The variant is absent from gnomAD and has been identified in multiple persons with a clinical diagnosis of ATTRv.

variants.segregation_data: Identified in multiple patients with clinical diagnosis of ATTRv.
variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on clinical presentation.
variants.additional_notes: Seven patients from six families with TTR p.T80I have been identified to date.
key_quotes: This alteration has been reported in multiple patients with ATTR.

tables_processed.table_caption: Summary of criteria used for classification of VLP

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data was extracted from the main text and tables.
